snippet.title: Rogue Stormers Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally done. Rogue Stormers is available on Steam in all its glory. Thanks to everyone who supported us, making this possible. To our magnificent backers on Kickstarter and Indiegogo. To the glorious players on Steam who sent valuable feedback. To friends and family who bore with us. 

Here's the release trailer - now go play the game!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/299480

#################
Get news, insights and behind the scenes information straight from Black Forest Games in our blog, on Facebook, or on Twitter: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlackForestTeam
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProjectGiana/
Blog: http://blog.black-forest-games.com/
#################

About Rogue Stormers: 
[b]Rogue Stormers [/b] is a modernized Contra/Metal Slug mash-up with roguelike and RPG elements, crazy 3D graphics and co-op multiplayer for one to 4 players.
